overview:
Joshua is the Founder and Lead Project Manager of Sunforged Media Group, a Syracuse, New York, based New Media Company that pairs traditional Fine Artists with Online Advertising and Print Opportunities in addition to more traditional Web and Identity services.

Prior to founding Sunforged Media Group, Joshua was an Organizer and Consultant with multiple New York based Political campaigns with a focus on the Environmental movement. This included several successful Mayoral Election campaigns.

Concurrently, Joshua was a Co-Editor and Director of Advertising Sales for both the Ascent and Artifact Magazines.

Joshua holds a Bachelor of the Arts Degree in Political Science and Community Organizing with Minors in both Fine Arts and Religious Thought and Philosophy. He is an active Fine Arts Painter with works on display in galleries throughout Western New York and an Author with published books ranging in topics from WordPress Training to Modern Literature. He is the Fundraising Chair for TFML #896 and enjoys learning and practicing Sustainable farming methods on his secluded New York farm.
